name: Today'sHighlight
0:
”Alexa, ask Today's Highlight about today”
”Alexa, ask Today's Highlight what's special about today”
”Alexa, ask Today's Highlight what should I celebrate today”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: today's highlight
des:
Presenting Today's Highlight with a collection of over 1000 different events to discover and celebrate throughout the year, with up to 3 events for each day.
There's a lot to explore and celebrate each day, so hop on and simply ask Alexa about today's event.
Whether it is a Pie Day or Answer Your Cat’s Questions Day, Today's Highlight has got you covered.

So have fun and enjoy today.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
